Description:
Attention first home buyers and investors.
Conveniently located in a quiet street this well presented 3 bedroom home on a 583m2 approx. block is ready & waiting. With floorboards upon entry which flow through the home boasting 3 generous sized bedrooms all with BIR's, light filled living area with wall heater and ceiling fan. The updated kitchen provides plenty of bench and cupboard space and an adjoining dining area. The central bathroom services the home also providing a separate toilet and laundry with rear yard access. The secure rear yard with pergola, garden shed and a low maintenance grassed yard. Location is ideal, just a short commute to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway. This home really does have it all! Currently tenanted, be sure to enquire today before it's too late.
Insights: 36 Colorado Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Fabulous Four Bedroom Home with Views
Set on an approximately 640sqm block, this property was designed with spacious living, privacy and entertaining in mind. Open plan living areas plus an impressive sheltered outdoor entertaining area ideal for entertaining year round. The warm and inviting lounge located at the entrance contains split system air conditioning and flows through to the meals/kitchen area which provides dishwasher, gas cooking and ample cupboard space. Just off the main hall lies the 2 generous bedrooms both with BIRs, powder room and generous bathroom with double vanity and a corner spa. Up to the first floor you'll find 2 additional bedrooms with BIRs and a spacious second living area with built in bar and sliding doors opening onto the veranda which boasts spectacular views of the Shell Reserve located just over the back fence.
This wonderful home provides privacy and security featuring wired alarm system and secure fencing the whole way around. An additional carport with electric roller door provides access from the rear of the property via Shell Reserve while a solid brick veneer garage at the front of the home offers additional undercover parking while still providing plenty of room for trailers or other car parks in the spacious front driveway.
With a great location, this property has all the major amenities at its fingertips! Just a minutes' stroll to the Corio Shopping Centre, bus routes located close by and around the corner from quality schools for all ages.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
Insights: 19 Teleta Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Endless possibilities.
Don't miss out on this fantastic brick home set on approx. 666m2 block in one of Corio's most sought after locations.
This well looked after home comprises of 3 bedrooms (two with BIR's), large lounge upon entry, practical kitchen with room for a meals area, neat and tidy central bathroom, single carport and large grassed backyard.
The home features floor boards that flow throughout the home and ample cupboard and bench space in the kitchen.
In addition, the deep backyard provides ample room to retain the existing home and construct additional dwellings at the rear (STCA). The property boasts plenty of appeal for the Melbourne commuter with the Princes Highway & major amenities close by.
Don't miss out on the opportunity to purchase this great first home or neat investment.

Some of the many features include an expansive covered entertainment area with drive through access and an extra single garage & workshop. Be sure to inspect as this property won't disappoint!

* Double garage with drive through access

* Low maintenance gardens with ample backyard
* Possible return is $385 per week

Description:
What are you waiting for?
Situated in an excellent location, perfect for first home buyers, downsizers or investors this immaculate unit provides a relaxing environment, is separately titled, functional & very comfortable. Low maintenance living at its finest, this stunning brick home on a 320m2 approx. allotment offers open planned living & dining at the rear, 2 comfortable bedrooms (both with BIR's), a generous central bathroom with 2-way-access, large laundry offering ample storage, internal access to the single garage, practical kitchen at the heart of the home and a superb private backyard boasting a large pergola shade cloth. Offering plenty of appeal for Melbourne commuters with easy access to the Princes Highway & Geelong Ring road the home is located in a well-established neighbourhood and just a short drive to Corio Shopping Centre.
Enquire today, with such high demand in this area, this charming home is sure not to last long on the market.

Description:
5 Bedroom Beauty with Side Access!
Placed in the tightly held Rose Park Estate and on a 612m2 parcel of land with side access, perfect for storing the caravan, boat or trailer, you won't want to miss out on this home!
Offering 5 bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in robe, ceiling fan and full ensuite including double shower, vanity and toilet.
Boasting 2 living areas- a front carpeted lounge and a spacious tiled open plan living and separate dining area surrounding the functional galley style kitchen complete with gas hot plate and electric oven.
The family bathroom also offers a double shower, bath and vanity and is centrally located to 3 of the bedrooms.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling along with multiple ceiling fans keep the home comfortable all year round.
Double garage with remote panel lift door, internal access and rear roller door. A large side gate opens into the spacious backyard which showcases a fantastic outdoor entertaining area perfect for hosting family gatherings and BBQs all year round.
Garden shed, water tank and 12 solar panels complete this wonderful package!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Corner Site, Huge Home & Loads Of Potential
Situated on a large corner site over 670 sqms this home has been extended and updated and can come with tenants who really call it home. Consisting of 4 bedrooms, the master features full ens uite and walk-in robe, updated kitchen open to a meals area and lounge plus there is a second living zone where both flow to the covered entertainment area. Gas heating with an air conditioner there are also hardwood and floating floors plus an updated bathroom. Outside features a carport/covered entertainment area, double tandem garage all on a corner site that could be a lucrative re-development site (stca) at 677 sqm (approximately). Handy to Aldi, schools, transport and offering easy access to the Ring Road and Highway a mere 50 minutes to Melbournes CBD, don't miss this rare corner opportunity.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Solar panels, air-conditioning & security system are just some of the extras for you to enjoy. Walking distance from schools, transport & shopping centre makes this property a must see'.

Description:
Location, Convenience and Great Yard Space
A great opportunity offering everything for the investor or owner/occupier. This brick veneer unit offers everything you may need and more. Open plan lounge, dining area with polished timber flooring, reverse cycle split system air conditioning, kitchen with an electric stove and breakfast bar, separate laundry, two linen presses and built-in robes to both bedrooms. Outside is a real surprise with a beautiful alfresco/decking area as well as a generous side yard. There is also a single lock up garage and a very large set back from Cox Road, giving plenty of garden space as well as privacy. With public transport close by and within walking distance to medical centre, primary schools, and both the Bell Post Shopping Centre and Corio Village being very close by don't delay or you will miss out.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Set for Life!
Secure your financial future with this fantastic investment opportunity! With dual dwellings positioned on 750 sqm in a desirable court location, the main residence and a self-contained bungalow/ granny flat present enormous potential to secure 2 income-generating dwellings! The family home comprises 3 bedrooms; master with built-in-robe and lounge/living room with fireplace and split cycle inverter. Capitalise on entertainment options with the smart layout and design of a dining room which flows through to an alfresco area adjacent to the fully renovated kitchen with L-shaped bench, gas stove and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and oven. Added highlights include courtyard, solar panels and polished floorboards. A bungalow/granny flat provides the astute buyer with additional options. Comprising main bedroom with walk-in-robe and generous full ensuite, the flat contains huge open living zone, bathroom and dual undercover entertainment areas. Double insulation, heating and cooling ensure year-round comfort. All of this, within close proximity of shops, schools and public transport.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Immaculate corner block home.
Immaculately presented 3 bedroom brick veneer home, situated on a very generous 599m2 approx. corner block, offers boundless potential for first home buyers, investors and developers alike. Upon entry you will find the spacious lounge with a split system air conditioner and polished floorboards which flow throughout the home. The updated kitchen equipped with plenty of bench and cupboard space provides room for a meals area. The three comfortable bedrooms (2 with BIR's) are located off the main hall close to the central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry. Sitting on an extensive allotment the rear yard offers large grassed area and a 2 car garage perfect for those needing secure off street parking. Location is ideal, just a short commute to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway. This home really does have it all!

Description:
Gorgeous 3 bedroom home.
This 3 Bedroom property provides more than meets the eye, this home is sure to be well sort after by all! Neatly presented and situated on a large 566m2 allotment, this property is ideal for families or first home buyers looking for a large home. This elaborate home boasts 3 bedrooms in total (master with BIR), comfortable lounge at the front of the property with electric fire place, renovated central bathroom with shower over bath, a well proportioned renovated kitchen while towards the rear of the home lies a second lounge or dining area. The backyard provides an undercover entertainment area, a single garage and plenty of room left for the whole family to enjoy. Located just minutes drive to Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, parks & reserves. Easy access to public transport with bus stops just around the corner, and the Princes Highway close by means just a 10 minute drive to Geelong's waterfront and CBD. Be sure to inspect this before it's too late!
Insights: 5 Illinois Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect first investment property! - 333m2
This low maintenance 3 bedroom home on compact block is the perfect property for the first time investor! With renovated kitchen and bathroom, timber floors, front deck to fully enclosed private front yard, split system, and in such a great location, this little gem is a delight! Walking distance to Corio Village, schools and public transport. Currently rented at $240 per week.

Description:
1234m2 (approx.) parcel of land with approved plans and permits.
All the hard work has already been completed for you on this 1234m2 (approx) parcel of land. Complete with approved plans and permits to construct 3 (3 bedroom) townhouses. With everything ready to start building this is an extremely attractive development opportunity to construct and reap in the rental return or sell the finished townhouses individually, either way the potential that this new project possesses is sure to benefit the new owner in the future. Location is ideal just a short drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages & sporting facilities nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all!
Insights: 172 Matthews Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
"Great investment opportunity"
This 3 bedroom home is situated right in the heart of Corio. Located within a 10 minute walk from the main shopping centre, surrounded by schools, kindergartens, facilities and public transport right at your doorstep. Only a stone's throw away from the Princes Hwy for Geelong CBD commuters and a short 2 minutes' drive to the Geelong Ring Road bringing Melbourne CBD only a short 45 minute drive away plus some of Victoria's best beaches only a 30 minute drive and North Shore train station only 5 minutes' drive. Don't miss out!
Potential rent return of $260 per week. Currently tenanted until July 2018.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
